main event: A report from Project Blue Book detailing a sighting of a bright streak of light in the night sky observed on October 6, 1965 in the Northern Hemisphere.
interesting points: The bright light was reported to move rapidly across the night sky,The light was described as being brighter than any star,The sighting created a distinct trail behind it,The event lasted several seconds before the light disappeared,The report is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: a bright streak of light in the night sky
witness description: the witness reported a bright streak of light moving rapidly in the sky
